item.title: [GUIDE] mailcow feat. Alpine Linux = ❤️
item.author: Author
item.description: Moohoo everyone! Today not an update log of mailcow , instead a guide! The topic is: install mailcow on Alpine Linux, because although the compatibility is not yet 100% guaranteed mailcow works pretty well on Alpine! IntroductionIf you have ever dealt with the Linux world, you will probably have run across one or the other operating systems and may have heard the name Alpine Linux. Because what makes Alpine Linux different from other distributions is its light weight.
